# Clion 激活码


# 更新

&gt; ✅[Jetbrains系列产品2019.3.1最新激活方法[持续更新]](https://zhile.io/)

![CLion License Activation](/images/clion-2019.3.2.png)

# 旧时代

![CLion License Activation](/images/CLion_License_Activation_113.png)

&gt; ❌[2019 Clion PyCharm 激活码](https://blog.csdn.net/l297969586/article/details/78183671)

1. 在`/etc/hosts`文件末尾添加两行

    ```bash
    0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com
    0.0.0.0 www.jetbrains.com
    ```

2. 打开 `clion`/`pycharm`，选择 `Activate code`，输入

    ```bash
    812LFWMRSH--ti4tUsQISyJF/zfWxSHCr&#43;IcYrX2w24JO5bUZCPIGKSi&#43;IrgQ0RT2uum9n96o&#43;Eob9Z1iQ9nUZ6FJdpEW5g0Exe6sw8fLrWMoLFhtCIvVgQxEEt&#43;M7Z2xD0esmjP1kPKXZyc/i&#43;NCxA2EO2Sec9uifqklBGP1L3xoENAw2QsIWBfttIe6EPWhbS8TIMMr2vF/S3HrN8To5Hj5lwD/t1GHgFK1uWrhsuifAiKcVzqogybzGiR1h2&#43;yNYTMbKxP7uPCcdYMsIyrBNVRGA3IuEJgyGQTQlFbnVQoVUTGPW2tQxprmC464wMjKi40JHh27WzjOHPwgzxDaigwn4Z0EbSpA==-&#43;zdxlR2mmRYBPzGbUNdMN6OaXiXzxIWtMEkrJMO/5oUfQJbLLuMSMK0QHFmaI37WShyxZcfRCidwXjot4zmNBKnlyHodDij/78TmVqFl8nOeD5&#43;07B8VEaIu7c3E1N&#43;e1doC6wht4I4&#43;IEmtsPAdoaj5WCQVQbrI8KeT8M9VcBIWX7fD0fhexfg3ZRt0xqwMcXGNp3DdJHiO0rCdU&#43;Itv7EmtnSVq9jBG1usMSFvMowR25mju2JcPFp1&#43;I4ZI&#43;FqgR8gyG8oiNDyNEoAbsR3lOpI7grUYSvkB/xVy/VoklPCK2h0f0GJxFjnye8NT1PAywoyl7RmiAVRE/EKwIDAQABo4GZMIGWMAkGA1UdEwQCMAAwHQYDVR0OBBYEFGEpG9oZGcfLMGNBkY7SgHiMGgTcMEgGA1UdIwRBMD&#43;AFKOetkhnQhI2Qb1t4Lm0oFKLl/GzoRykGjAYMRYwFAYDVQQDDA1KZXRQcm9maWxlIENBggkA0myxg7KDeeEwEwYDVR0lBAwwCgYIKwYBBQUHAwEwCwYDVR0PBAQDAgWgMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAA4ICAQAF8uc&#43;YJOHHwOFcPzmbjcxNDuGoOUIP&#43;2h1R75Lecswb7ru2LWWSUMtXVKQzChLNPn/72W0k&#43;oI056tgiwuG7M49LXp4zQVlQnFmWU1wwGvVhq5R63Rpjx1zjGUhcXgayu7&#43;9zMUW596Lbomsg8qVve6euqsrFicYkIIuUu4zYPndJwfe0YkS5nY72SHnNdbPhEnN8wcB2Kz&#43;OIG0lih3yz5EqFhld03bGp222ZQCIghCTVL6QBNadGsiN/lWLl4JdR3lJkZzlpFdiHijoVRdWeSWqM4y0t23c92HXKrgppoSV18XMxrWVdoSM3nuMHwxGhFyde05OdDtLpCv&#43;jlWf5REAHHA201pAU6bJSZINyHDUTB&#43;Beo28rRXSwSh3OUIvYwKNVeoBY&#43;KwOJ7WnuTCUq1meE6GkKc4D/cXmgpOyW/1SmBz3XjVIi/zprZ0zf3qH5mkphtg6ksjKgKjmx1cXfZAAX6wcDBNaCL&#43;Ortep1Dh8xDUbqbBVNBL4jbiL3i3xsfNiyJgaZ5sX7i8tmStEpLbPwvHcByuf59qJhV/bZOl8KqJBETCDJcY6O2aqhTUy&#43;9x93ThKs1GKrRPePrWPluud7ttlgtRveit/pcBrnQcXOl1rHq7ByB8CFAxNotRUYL9IF5n3wJOgkPojMy6jetQA5Ogc8Sm7RG6vg1yow==
    ```
